item.title: Devony add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
Devony add a quote by John Bytheway
item.description: "don't do things that kill you." -- John Bytheway

item.title: Devony add a quote by Anne Campbell
item.description: "You are the trip I did not take; You are the pearls I cannot buy; You are my blue Italian lake; You are my piece of foreign sky." -- Anne Campbell
